A Door Opened - Overhead.Comment_2: Animation runs on door all closed doors if another is opened, on all overheads, to provide medium illumination.
A Door Opened - Overhead.Comment_3: Main Option as String_Var_1 is Pyrrhic
A Door Opened - Overhead.Comment_4: Christmas Option as String_Var_1 is Christmas

This Door Opened - Overhead.Comment_2: Animation runs on door newly opened, on door overhead, to provide illumination of seat.
This Door Opened - Overhead.Comment_3: Main Option as String_Var_1 is Pyrrhic
This Door Opened - Overhead.Comment_4: Christmas Option as String_Var_1 is Christmas

This Door Closed - Overhead.Comment_2: Animation runs on door newly closed, on door overhead, to remove illumination of seat.

This Door Recently Closed - Overhead.Comment_2: Animation runs on recently closed door overhead when all doors are closed.

All Doors Closed - Overhead.Comment_2: Animation runs on all closed doors overhead when all doors are closed.

Automobile - Gear Select_Park_On.Comment_2: Animation to run on gear select. Park.

Automobile - Gear Select_Park_Off.Comment_2: Animation to run on gear select. Park.

Automobile - Gear Select_Neutral_On.Comment_2: Animation to run on gear select. Neutral.

Automobile - Gear Select_Neutral_Off.Comment_2: Animation to run on gear select. Neutral.

Automobile - Gear Select_Reverse_On.Comment_2: Animation to run on gear select. REVERSE.

Automobile - Gear Select_Reverse_Off.Comment_2: Animation to run on gear select. REVERSE.

Automobile - Gear Select_Drive_On.Comment_2: Animation to run on gear select. DRIVE.

Automobile - Gear Select_Drive_Off.Comment_2: Animation to run on gear select. DRIVE.

Automobile - Signal_Left_On.Comment_2: Animation to turn on Left Signal Light.

Automobile - Signal_Left_Off.Comment_2: Animation to turn off Left Signal Light.

Automobile - Signal_Right_On.Comment_2: Animation to turn on Right Signal Light.

Automobile - Signal_Right_Off.Comment_2: Animation to turn off Right Signal Light.

This Door Opened - Exterior.Comment_2: Animation runs on door newly closed, on door exterior, to remove warning lights.

A Door is Opened - Exterior.Comment_2: Animation runs on door all closed doors if another is opened, on door exterior, to present awareness lights to traffic.

This Door Closed - Exterior.Comment_2: Animation runs on door newly closed, on door exterior, to remove warning lights.

This Door Opened and Another Open - Exte.Comment_2: Animation runs on door newly opened, on door exterior, to present warning lights to traffic.

This Door Closed and Another Open - Exte.Comment_2: Animation stops the A Door is Opened - Exterior animation

All Doors Closed - Exterior.Comment_2: Animation runs on all door exteriors, when all doors are closed, to remove all animations
